message: My turn. How about a slightly better deal for me this time? It's still a good offer for you.
Still willing to compromise, but need a bit more
Time is running out! Let's make a deal. This is a fair offer considering the inflation.
Getting anxious, meet me in the middle
Okay, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option.  Take the deal!
